{"topic":"Seating Arrangements (Linear, Circular)","question":"Five friends A, B, C, D, and E are sitting in a row facing north. If A is not sitting at either end, who could be sitting next to A?","choices":["A) Only B and C","B) Only C and D","C) Only D and E","D) Any two of B, C, or D"],"answer":"D","explanation":"Since A is not at either end, A can sit in the second, third, or fourth position. Thus, A can have any two of B, C, or D next to them."}

{"topic":"Syllogisms","question":"All cats are animals. Some pets are cats. Which of the following can be concluded?","choices":["A) All pets are animals.","B) Some animals are not cats.","C) Some pets are not cats.","D) Some animals are pets."],"answer":"D","explanation":"From the statements given, we know that all cats fall under the category of animals and some pets are cats. This means there is an overlap between pets and cats, and since all cats are animals, it follows that some animals (those which are pets) are indeed pets."}

{"topic":"Seating Arrangements (Linear, Circular)","question":"Five friends A, B, C, D and E are sitting in a row facing north. B is not at either end of the row. A is to the immediate left of C. E is second to the right of C. Who is sitting at the extreme left end?","choices":["A) D","B) A","C) B","D) C"],"answer":"A","explanation":"Given conditions place D at the extreme left end."}

{"topic":"Syllogisms","question":"All dogs are mammals. Some pets are dogs. Which of the following can be concluded?","choices":["A) All pets are mammals","B) Some mammals are not dogs","C) Some pets are mammals","D) No pets are mammals"],"answer":"C","explanation":"From the given statements, it can only be concluded that some pets are mammals because some pets are dogs and all dogs are mammals."}

{"topic":"Mixed Series (Alphanumeric)","question":"Identify the next in the series: A1, C3, E5, G7, ?","choices":["A) I9","B) J9","C) H9","D) K9"],"answer":"A","explanation":"The series alternates between increasing letters by 2 and numbers by 2."}
